title: Why is project yi's voice so quiet?
body: i cant even hear what he is saying

replies.body:
Hey Mody bird! 

As Matsoman said, we did acknowledge this was definitely not intended. 

We're in the process of updating this for all languages.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=dZ4w0NmO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-22T18:53:08.511+0000)
>
> Hey Mody bird! 
> 
> As Matsoman said, we did acknowledge this was definitely not intended. 
> 
> We're in the process of updating this for all languages.

Thanks
Of course! Talked to the audio bro working on this, and he's working on it right meow.~ :D
Yeah KateyKhaos acknowledged the bug some time ago in this forum, I haven't used the skin in a while so not sure if fixed.
